data.description:
Put on your VR headset and step into a virtual reality, where the new Hockey Shooter VR game gives you the chance to try yourself.

You can be sure that at least one of the 5 game modes will challenge you to upgrade your skills.

In Free Play mode you don't even have to worry about the number of pucks. Just skate, trick, score goals in a completely empty stadium that's all yours!

Choose Target Practice mode and hit the targets as accurately as possible if you would like to improve your shooting skills.

Want to practice accurate long shots between the two ends of the rink? The Long Range is made for you!

If you like challenges and difficult Obstacle courses, you'll love this game mode.

In the brand new Goalie mode, you'll quickly test that your reflexes are good enough. 

BUT! The best thing in the new version is that you can personalise your player's jersey, helmet, gloves and even accessories like hockey sticks and pucks

Players can now gather in-game currency (Coins) with repeatable challenges and they can use these coins to buy customization items. 

Planned changes
-Photo mode to capture your appearance in any pose you want  to
-Scoring system with leaderboards where you can show off your scores and appearance via your self made photo.
- More environments, the next one is a Nature themed one
- Ability to play with your own hockey stick.

Help us with your feedback:
https://discord.gg/n444dRehQ5

Original price is 7,99$. This 3,99$ available only for limited time.
